snippet: Temporary to full-time opportunity for a Receptionist in a non-profit company based in Minneapolis. This company specializes in leasing and property management...
teaser:
Temporary to full-time opportunity for a Receptionist in a non-profit company based in Minneapolis. This company specializes in leasing and property management, so previous experience is required. Ideal candidates are detailed oriented and have the ability to mutli-task in a success- driven environment.

Description:
  • Greet visitors coming into the office
  • Assist people with housing needs/questions
  • Initiate the housing process with individuals/families
  • Show model rooms and facilities to prospective buyers
Mandatory Qualifications
  • Property Management or Leasing Experience
Interested candidates should submit resumes to darcy.mitsch@officeteam.com
Intermediate Basic Office Skills, Intermediate MS Outlook, Property Management/Leasing experience.
